title: Can't post discussions or comments.
body:
Hello. I've not posted on the OCE boards before (although I've been using the NA boards for a while), and currently can not post comments, nor make threads of my own outside of Help & Support. In the comments section it says I can't post because I must be level 5 or higher, but my summoner level is above eighty.

Can anyone help me out here? I want to enter the Skins Story Slam contest, but can't without being able to post anything.


EDIT. Ironically, posting this thread seems to have updated my account, and I am now allowed to post anywhere. I'll pretend that was the plan all along.

replies.body: The issue results from your in game level not being synced to boards which results in you being unable to post in boards with level limits. There is a stop gap sync tool in place which syncs when you either upvote a comment or post, or create a discussion in H and S, which is why it now works for you :)
That makes sense. Thanks for the explanation.
